file_content.text: When I get back, I'll make sure everyone knows how you handled those Republic agents.
Our supplies! And the uniforms, too? I thought it would take a whole platoon to handle those infiltrators.
Duty is my life.
Your praise isn't necessary.
It did get messy....
Still, it couldn't have been easy. Thank you.
With those uniforms and IDs, the Republic could infiltrate Kaas City itself. You must get them back!
Finally, somebody armed. I couldn't do anything. It was a group of spacers--we were helping them and they attacked us!
I ran in here when they shot Nashal, but I heard them talking. I think they're Republic spies!
Just tell me where these Republic agents went.
Where are they now?
Calm down.
You were duped.
You're right--it's stupid to be so trusting of strangers.
They ransacked the camp for supplies and uniforms--even stole identification off each body. Then they found one of our maps.
We'd located a hidden cave at the bottom of the waterfall nearby. They could regroup there and shoot anyone who gets close.
Stay here. I'll handle it.
Did you get a chance to count them?
How many?
Enough to slaughter my colleagues, that's all I know.
I'll wipe them out.
We need our uniforms and IDs back, our supplies reclaimed and those spies destroyed. Please, the security of the Empire is at risk!
I can't let them find me. I can't. I won't!
